name: EditProjectEnvironmentVariable
description:
Edit a specific environment variable for a project.

Use this tool to modify an environment variable of a Vercel project by providing the variable's ID and the project's ID or name.

parameters.name: project_id_or_name
parameters.description: Specify the unique project identifier or the project name.

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

parameters.name: environment_variable_id
parameters.description: The unique environment variable identifier for the Vercel project.

parameters.name: environment_variable_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the environment variable's key, value, type, target environments, and optional attributes such as git branch, custom environment IDs, and comments.

key.description: The name of the environment variable

target.description: The target environment of the environment variable

gitBranch.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable (must have target=preview)

value.description: The value of the environment variable

customEnvironmentIds.description: The custom environments that the environment variable should be synced to

comment.description: A comment to add context on what this env var is for

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team on whose behalf the request is made.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The identifier for the team on whose behalf the request is made. This is usually a URL-friendly name for the team.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

value_schema.description: The unique project identifier or the project name

key.description: The name of the environment variable

target.description: The target environment of the environment variable

gitBranch.description: If defined, the git branch of the environment variable (must have target=preview)

value.description: The value of the environment variable

customEnvironmentIds.description: The custom environments that the environment variable should be synced to

comment.description: A comment to add context on what this env var is for
